name: Maxi Craft Exploration Master
description:
Amazing sandbox and craft in one game, discover a survival mode and creative. Extract new blocks with a pickaxe for the construction of structures, create anything you like. Discover different worlds and biomes in the game, gather resources, explore caves and mines, create weapons and armor or new blocks. Find new places, travel the world, meet new characters and make new friends!

Cool pixel HD graphics, generating maps, easy controls in the game, adjusting the performance and distance for different devices (use the settings in the game) and much more for free!
